pages.text: $(#bd951a)Health:$()$(#ff0000)36$(br)$(#bd951a)Heal:$()$(#ff0000)1HP/30s$(br)$(#bd951a)DPS:$()$(#ff0000)Insta-kill, 10.5 (16 DMG/1.5s, if target is Immune)$(br)$(#bd951a)Chew Time:$()$(#ff0000)10s$(br)$(#bd951a)Special:$()$(#ff0000)Zombies prefer to eat them. Kills a zombie instantly, but has to chew it afterwards.$(br2)$(#bd951a)Chomper almost got a gig doing stunts for The Little Shop of Horrors but it fell through when his agent demanded too much on the front end.

pages.title: BLOOM & DOOM SEED CO.
pages.text: $(#25228d)Chompers can devour a zombie whole, but they are vulnerable while chewing.
